message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 60, you take 40.  This way we both get a good share.
Your turn, Alice.  Let's see if you think a 60/40 split in your favor is still fair in round 2.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise a bit.  Let's do 54 for me, 46 for you.  This is the last round before things get really tough with the inflation.
